content: Not sure if this has been discussed in the past, but would adding the escape key as a shortcut to scroll to the bottom of whatever stream you're in and mark everything as read be good? Slack has this feature and I find it useful.
Hey! Try pressing "Page Down" key in any narrow to scroll to bottom and mark as read.

Thanks, I wasn't really aware of that shortcut haha. But it doesn't scroll to the bottom, at least from what I just tried. It only scrolls a little bit. Slack's escape shortcut scrolls to the very bottom, so if you've been away for a little while, getting to the last message sent is really quick. Let me know if I'm doing something wrong with the existing shortcuts.
Sorry. I meant "End". The keys are close on my keyboard and I've gotten into the habit of blindly pressing it.
(here is the list of all shortcuts https://chat.zulip.org/help/keyboard-shortcuts)
Even easier, press ? to see all shortcuts right here.
G also works if you're on a MacOS
Ahaha, I meant that most MacOS don't have the "End" key.
